properties.query:
DeviceProcessEvents
| where ((ProcessCommandLine in~ ("dllhost.exe", "dllhost")) and FolderPath endswith "\\dllhost.exe") and (not(isnull(ProcessCommandLine)))

tags.name: description
tags.value: Detects a "dllhost" process spawning with no commandline arguments which is very rare to happen and could indicate process injection activity or malware mimicking similar system processes.
